author: rb:ez.no
msg: - Disallow pre and post modification to a variable: {++$a++}.
- Disallow pre operator and post modification to a variable: {!$a++}.
- Disallow pre modifying operator and an operator: {++$a + 1 }.
- Disallow post modifying operator and an operator: {$a++ + 1}.

author: rb:ez.no
msg: - Depending on how the unit tests are called, XDebug reaches the maximum
function nesting.  (Running only the regression tests, works. Running all
tests is just over the recursion limit.) Reduced the amount of parenthesis
in the parenthesis test to resolve this problem.

author: rb:ez.no
msg: - Moved error messages to one file.

author: rb:ez.no
msg: - The expression parser doesn't use the atEnd function anymore.
- The wrong expression {1 + } can be detected.
# Need to add extra tests, and cleanup the commented lines.
